page.title: 06Agriculture
page.content: This part of Devon with its generous rainfall,has long been a green and pleasant land for dairy cattle but the European Economic Community Quota policy has led to many farmers having to decrease there herd and some looking to other forms of farming for their income. Some have large herds of sheep. At Torrington there is a large milk factory where most of the local milk production is processed. there are no factories in the parish but one farm specialises in mushroom production and others produce cheese,yoghurt and ice cream from localmilk.
